plot: This short film provides an insight into Robert Opie's early life. Robert Opie, brand historian, curator and founder of the Museum of Brands in Notting Hill, reveals how he started collecting and what keeps him collecting today.
title: A Lifetime's Work: Robert Opie and the Museum of Brands
plot_es: This short film provides an insight into Robert Opie's early life. Robert Opie, brand historian, curator and founder of the Museum of Brands in Notting Hill, reveals how he started collecting and what keeps him collecting today.
original_name: A Lifetime's Work: Robert Opie and the Museum of Brands
